 That afternoon , we dropped in at my friend's house. I went to the door and rang the bell. Soon , Lily came to the door.She didn't expect our visit. So she looked at us in surprise. Before she could say _ , I rushed, "I heard that you were having a hard day and decided to bring you something. I hope your day goes _ ."The look on Lily's face was getting  bright in that small act, It was as if a dark sky suddenly shone with the golden rays of the sun. Her day was cheered up .
